trans-unit.source: Encapsulates the data source for a form.
trans-unit.target: Contém a origem de dados para um formulário.

trans-unit.source: The BindingSource component serves many purposes.
trans-unit.target: O componente de BindingSource serve vários fins.

trans-unit.source: First, it simplifies binding controls on a form to data by providing currency management, change notification, and other services between Windows Forms controls and data sources.
trans-unit.target: Em primeiro lugar, simplifica controlos de enlace de um formulário para dados ao fornecer gestão de moeda, a notificação de alteração e a outros serviços entre controlos de formulários do Windows e origens de dados.

trans-unit.source: This is accomplished by attaching the BindingSource component to your data source using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataSource%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Isto é conseguido ao anexar o componente de BindingSource para a origem de dados utilizando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataSource%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: For complex binding scenarios you can optionally set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataMember%2A> property to a specific column or list in the data source.
trans-unit.target: Para cenários de enlace complexa, opcionalmente, pode definir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataMember%2A>propriedade para uma coluna específica ou a lista da origem de dados.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataMember%2A>

trans-unit.source: You then bind controls to the BindingSource.
trans-unit.target: Em seguida, vincular controlos a BindingSource.

trans-unit.source: All further interaction with the data is accomplished with calls to the BindingSource component.
trans-unit.target: Todos os interação mais com os dados é efetuada com chamadas para o componente de BindingSource.

trans-unit.source: For examples on how the BindingSource can simplify the binding process, see [How to: Bind Windows Forms Controls to DBNull Database Values](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [How to: Handle Errors and Exceptions that Occur with Databinding](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter exemplos sobre como a BindingSource pode simplificar o processo de enlace, consulte [como: vincular controlos de formulários do Windows para valores de base de dados de DBNull](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) e [como: processar erros e exceções que Occur com Databinding](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Navigation and updating of the data source is accomplished through methods such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.MoveNext%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.MoveLast%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Remove%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Navegação e a atualização da origem de dados é conseguido através de métodos tais como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.MoveNext%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.MoveLast%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Remove%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Remove%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.MoveLast%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.MoveNext%2A>

trans-unit.source: Operations such as sorting and filtering are handled through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Sort%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Filter%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Operações como ordenar e filtrar são processadas através do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Sort%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Filter%2A>Propriedades.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Filter%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Sort%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information on using sorting and filtering with the BindingSource, see [How to: Sort and Filter ADO.NET Data with the Windows Forms BindingSource Component](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como utilizar a ordenar e filtrar com a BindingSource, consulte [como: a ordenação e dados do ADO.NET de filtro com o componente do Windows Forms BindingSource](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: In addition, the BindingSource component can act as a strongly typed data source.
trans-unit.target: Além disso, o componente de BindingSource pode agir como uma origem de dados com tipo seguro.

trans-unit.source: Typically the type of the underlying data source is fixed through one of the following mechanisms: - Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Add%2A> method to add an item to the BindingSource component.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, o tipo da origem de dados subjacente é corrigido através de um dos mecanismos seguintes:-Utilize o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Add%2A>método para adicionar um item para o componente da BindingSource.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Add%2A>

trans-unit.source: - Set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataSource%2A> property to a list, single object, or type.
trans-unit.target: -Definir a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataSource%2A>propriedade a uma lista, um único objeto ou um tipo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: Both of these mechanisms create a strongly-typed list.
trans-unit.target: Ambos estes mecanismos de criar uma lista de tipo seguro.

trans-unit.source: For more information on how to use the BindingSource to bind to a type, see [How to: Bind a Windows Forms Control to a Type](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como utilizar a BindingSource para vincular a um tipo, consulte [como: vincular um controlo Windows Forms para um tipo](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: You can also use the BindingSource to bind your controls to a factory object.
trans-unit.target: Também pode utilizar a BindingSource à qual vincular os controlos de um objeto de fábrica.

trans-unit.source: For more information on how to do this, see [How to: Bind a Windows Forms Control to a Factory Object](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como fazê-lo, consulte [como: vincular um controlo Windows Forms para um objeto de fábrica](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Because a BindingSource handles both simple and complex data sources, terminology is problematic.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Porque uma BindingSource processa ambas as origens de dados simples e complexos, terminologia é complicada.

trans-unit.source: Within this class documentation, the term *list* refers to a data collection within the hosted data source, and *item* denotes a single element.
trans-unit.target: Dentro desta documentação de classe, o termo *lista* refere-se a uma coleção de dados dentro origem de dados alojada e *item* indica que um único elemento.

trans-unit.source: When discussing functionality associated with complex data sources, the equivalent terms *table* and *row* are used.
trans-unit.target: Quando debater funcionalidade associados a origens de dados complexas, os termos de licenciamento equivalentes *tabela* e *linha* são utilizados.

trans-unit.source: BindingSource provides members for accessing the underlying data.
trans-unit.target: A BindingSource fornece membros para aceder aos dados subjacentes.

trans-unit.source: The current item can be retrieved through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Current%2A> property, and the entire list can be retrieved through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O item atual pode ser obtido através do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Current%2A>propriedade e a lista completa podem ser obtido através do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Current%2A>

trans-unit.source: Editing operations are supported on the current item through <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Current%2A> and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.RemoveCurrent%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.EndEdit%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.CancelEdit%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Add%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AddNew%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Edição de operações é suportada no item atual através de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Current%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.RemoveCurrent%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.EndEdit%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.CancelEdit%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Add%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AddNew%2A>métodos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AddNew%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Add%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.CancelEdit%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.EndEdit%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.RemoveCurrent%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Current%2A>

trans-unit.source: Although currency management is handled automatically for all underlying data source types, this class exposes a number of events, such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.CurrentItemChanged> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataSourceChanged>, that allow for customization.
trans-unit.target: Apesar de moeda é processada a gestão automaticamente para todos os tipos de origem de dados subjacente, esta classe expõe um número de eventos, tal como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.CurrentItemChanged>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataSourceChanged>, que permitem para personalização.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataSourceChanged> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.CurrentItemChanged>

trans-unit.source: Data sources that are bound to a BindingSource component can also be navigated and managed with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator> class, which provides a VCR-like user interface (UI) for navigating items within a list.
trans-unit.target: Origens de dados que estão vinculadas a um componente de BindingSource também podem ser utilizadas e geridas com o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator>classe, que fornece uma interface de utilizador (IU) como o VCR para navegar itens numa lista.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator>

trans-unit.source: Although <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator> can be bound to any data source, it was designed to integrate with a BindingSource component through its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.BindingSource%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Embora <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator>pode estar vinculado a qualquer origem de dados foi concebido para integrar com um componente de BindingSource através do respetivo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.BindingSource%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.BindingSource%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator>

trans-unit.source: The default property for the BindingSource class is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataSource%2A>.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade predefinida para a classe de BindingSource é <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataSource%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default event is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.CurrentChanged>.
trans-unit.target: O evento de predefinição está <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.CurrentChanged>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.CurrentChanged>

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > Many of the members of the BindingSource class operate on the underlying list represented by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List%2A> property and simply refer their operation to the underlying list.
trans-unit.target: > [!CAUTION] > Muitos dos membros da classe BindingSource operam na lista subjacente representada pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List%2A>propriedade e consulte simplesmente o funcionamento para a lista subjacente.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List%2A>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, when the BindingSource is bound to a custom implementation of <xref:System.Collections.IList>, the exact behavior of these members may differ from the behavior described in the class documentation.
trans-unit.target: Por conseguinte, quando a BindingSource está vinculada a uma implementação personalizada de <xref:System.Collections.IList>, o comportamento exato destes membros pode divergir do comportamento descrito na documentação de classe.</xref:System.Collections.IList>

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.RemoveAt%2A> method calls <xref:System.Collections.IList.RemoveAt%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.RemoveAt%2A>chamadas de método <xref:System.Collections.IList.RemoveAt%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Collections.IList.RemoveAt%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.RemoveAt%2A>

trans-unit.source: The BindingSource documentation describes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.RemoveAt%2A> method with the understanding that the <xref:System.Collections.IList.RemoveAt%2A> method for the underlying <xref:System.Collections.IList> is correctly implemented.
trans-unit.target: A documentação da BindingSource descreve o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.RemoveAt%2A>método com a compreender que o <xref:System.Collections.IList.RemoveAt%2A>método para subjacentes <xref:System.Collections.IList>é corretamente implementado.</xref:System.Collections.IList> </xref:System.Collections.IList.RemoveAt%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.RemoveAt%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource"></xref> class to the default property values.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource"> </xref> classe para os valores de propriedade predefinidos.

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the default <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> property values initialized by this constructor.
trans-unit.target: A tabela seguinte mostra as predefinições <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>valores de propriedade inicializados por este construtor.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>

trans-unit.source: |Property|Default value| |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataSource%2A>|`null`| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataMember%2A>|<xref:System.String.Empty>| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Sort%2A>|`null`| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Filter%2A>|`null`| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.RaiseListChangedEvents%2A>|`true`|
trans-unit.target: | Propriedade | Valor predefinido | |--------------|-------------------| | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataSource%2A>| `null`| | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataMember%2A>| <xref:System.String.Empty>| | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Sort%2A>| `null`| | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Filter%2A>| `null`| | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.RaiseListChangedEvents%2A>| `true`|</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.RaiseListChangedEvents%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Filter%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Sort%2A></xref:System.String.Empty></xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataMember%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource"></xref> class and adds the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource"></xref> to the specified container.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource"> </xref> classe e adiciona o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource"> </xref> para o contentor especificado.

trans-unit.source: This constructor calls the default constructor, and then adds the current <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> to the specified container.
trans-unit.target: Este construtor chama o construtor predefinido e, em seguida, adiciona atual <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>para o contentor especificado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>

trans-unit.source: It is not typically used by the solutions programmer, but instead by authors of design-time environments.
trans-unit.target: Não é normalmente utilizado pelo programador soluções, mas em vez disso, pelos autores de ambientes de tempo de criação.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IContainer"></xref> to add the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource"></xref> to.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IContainer"> </xref> adicionar atual <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource"> </xref> para.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource"></xref> class with the specified data source and data member.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource"> </xref> classe com o membro de dados e origem de dados especificada.

trans-unit.source: The data source for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A origem de dados para o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The specific column or list name within the data source to bind to.
trans-unit.target: O nome de coluna ou uma lista específico numa origem de dados à qual vincular.

trans-unit.source: Adds an existing item to the internal list.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona um item existente para a lista interna.

trans-unit.source: The Add method refers the call to the underlying list's `Add` method.
trans-unit.target: O método Add refere-se a chamada para a lista subjacente `Add` método.

trans-unit.source: The internal list must contain homogenous types.
trans-unit.target: A lista interna tem de conter tipos homogéneo.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataSource%2A> property has not already been set, then the first object added to the list defines the type for the list.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataSource%2A>propriedade já não tiver sido definida, em seguida, o primeiro objeto adicionado à lista de define o tipo de lista.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ListChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: Este método gera o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ListChanged>eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ListChanged>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> to be added to the internal list.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Object>para ser adicionado à lista de interna.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index at which value was added to the underlying list represented by the property.
trans-unit.target: O índice baseado em zero que value foi adicionado à lista subjacente representada pelo propriedade.

trans-unit.source: value differs in type from the existing items in the underlying list.
trans-unit.target: valuedifere no tipo dos itens existentes na lista subjacente.

trans-unit.source: Occurs before an item is added to the underlying list.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre antes de um item é adicionado à lista subjacente.

trans-unit.source: The AddingNew event occurs before a new object is added to the underlying list represented by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O evento AddingNew ocorre antes de um novo objeto é adicionado à lista subjacente representada pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List%2A>

trans-unit.source: This event is fired after the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AddNew%2A> method is called, but before the new item is created and added to the underlying list.
trans-unit.target: Este evento é desencadeado depois do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AddNew%2A>método é chamado, mas antes do novo item é criado e adicionado à lista subjacente.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AddNew%2A>

trans-unit.source: By handling this event, the programmer can provide custom item creation and insertion behavior without being forced to derive from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> class.
trans-unit.target: Ao processar este evento, o programador pode fornecer a criação de item personalizado e comportamento de inserção sem a ser forçada a derivar da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>classe.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>

trans-unit.source: This is accomplished in the event handler by setting the <xref:System.ComponentModel.AddingNewEventArgs.NewObject%2A> property of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.AddingNewEventArgs?displayProperty=fullName> parameter to the new item.
trans-unit.target: Isto é conseguido o processador de eventos, definindo o <xref:System.ComponentModel.AddingNewEventArgs.NewObject%2A>propriedade do <xref:System.ComponentModel.AddingNewEventArgs?displayProperty=fullName>parâmetro para o novo item.</xref:System.ComponentModel.AddingNewEventArgs?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ComponentModel.AddingNewEventArgs.NewObject%2A>

trans-unit.source: The new object created in the AddingNew event must be of the same type as the type contained in the list or an exception will occur.
trans-unit.target: O novo objeto criado no evento AddingNew tem de ser do mesmo tipo com o contidas na lista ou irá ocorrer uma excepção.

trans-unit.source: You cannot set the <xref:System.ComponentModel.AddingNewEventArgs.NewObject%2A> property when bound to a <xref:System.Data.DataView> or <xref:System.Data.DataTable> because you cannot add a new <xref:System.Data.DataRowView> to the list.
trans-unit.target: Não é possível definir o <xref:System.ComponentModel.AddingNewEventArgs.NewObject%2A>propriedade quando vinculada a um <xref:System.Data.DataView>ou <xref:System.Data.DataTable>porque não é possível adicionar um novo <xref:System.Data.DataRowView>à lista.</xref:System.Data.DataRowView> </xref:System.Data.DataTable> </xref:System.Data.DataView> </xref:System.ComponentModel.AddingNewEventArgs.NewObject%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about supplying custom new item functionality, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AddNew%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para mais informações sobre como fornecer novas funcionalidades de item personalizado, consulte o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AddNew%2A>método.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AddNew%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como lidar com eventos, consulte [eventos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ComponentModel.AddingNewEventArgs.NewObject*> is not the same type as the type contained in the list.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.AddingNewEventArgs.NewObject*>Não é o mesmo tipo com o contidas na lista.</xref:System.ComponentModel.AddingNewEventArgs.NewObject*>

trans-unit.source: Adds a new item to the underlying list.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona um novo item à lista subjacente.

trans-unit.source: The AddNew method adds a new item to the underlying list represented by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O método AddNew adiciona um novo item à lista subjacente representada pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method sets up the following series of actions: 1.
trans-unit.target: Este método, configura a seguinte série de ações: 1.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.EndEdit%2A> method is automatically called to commit any pending edit operations.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.EndEdit%2A>método denomina-se automaticamente ao consolidar quaisquer operações pendentes de edição.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.EndEdit%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AddingNew> event is automatically raised.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AddingNew>o evento é gerado automaticamente.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AddingNew>

trans-unit.source: This event can be programmatically handled to construct the new item.
trans-unit.target: Este evento pode ser processado através de programação para construir o novo item.

trans-unit.source: This is accomplished in the event handler by setting the <xref:System.ComponentModel.AddingNewEventArgs.NewObject%2A> property of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.AddingNewEventArgs?displayProperty=fullName> parameter to the new item.
trans-unit.target: Isto é conseguido o processador de eventos, definindo o <xref:System.ComponentModel.AddingNewEventArgs.NewObject%2A>propriedade do <xref:System.ComponentModel.AddingNewEventArgs?displayProperty=fullName>parâmetro para o novo item.</xref:System.ComponentModel.AddingNewEventArgs?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ComponentModel.AddingNewEventArgs.NewObject%2A>

trans-unit.source: The new object created in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AddingNew> event must be of the same type as the type contained in the list or an exception will occur.
trans-unit.target: O novo objeto criado no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AddingNew>evento tem de ser do mesmo tipo com o contidas na lista ou irá ocorrer uma excepção.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AddingNew>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AddingNew> event is not handled, and the underlying list is an <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList>, then the request is passed to the list's <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.AddNew%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AddingNew>evento não é processado e é a lista subjacente um <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList>, em seguida, o pedido é transferido para a lista <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.AddNew%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método.</xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.AddNew%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AddingNew>

trans-unit.source: If the underlying list is not an <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList>, the item is automatically created through its public default constructor.
trans-unit.target: Se a lista subjacente não é um <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList>, o item é criado automaticamente através do respetivo construtor público predefinido.</xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList>

trans-unit.source: In either case, the new item is added to the end of the list.
trans-unit.target: Em ambos os casos, o novo item é adicionado ao fim da lista.

trans-unit.source: The new item is added immediately to the internal list unless the data source implements the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableObject> interface.
trans-unit.target: O novo item é adicionado imediatamente para a lista interna, a menos que a origem de dados implementa o <xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableObject>interface.</xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableObject>

trans-unit.source: In this case, the new item is not committed until an explicit call to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.System%23ComponentModel%23ICancelAddNew%23EndNew%2A> is made or until a new list operation is initiated.
trans-unit.target: Neste caso, o novo item não está consolidado até uma chamada explícita para <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.System%23ComponentModel%23ICancelAddNew%23EndNew%2A>é efetuada ou até que é iniciada uma operação de lista nova.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.System%23ComponentModel%23ICancelAddNew%23EndNew%2A>

trans-unit.source: Before it is committed, the new item can be rolled back by calling <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.CancelEdit%2A>, in which case the new item is discarded.
trans-unit.target: Antes de ser consolidada, o novo item pode ser revertido ao chamar <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.CancelEdit%2A>, caso em que o novo item é rejeitado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.CancelEdit%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ListChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: Este método gera o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ListChanged>eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ListChanged>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> that was created and added to the list.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Object>que foi criado e adicionado à lista.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AllowNew*> property is set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AllowNew*>propriedade está definida como <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AllowNew*>

trans-unit.source: -or- A public default constructor could not be found for the current item type.
trans-unit.target: - ou - não foi possível localizar um construtor público predefinido para o tipo de item actual.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether items in the underlying list can be edited.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se os itens na lista subjacente podem ser editados.

trans-unit.source: The AllowEdit property is typically used by other components to determine if editing of items in the list is allowed.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade de valor de AllowEdit é normalmente utilizada por outros componentes para determinar se a edição de itens na lista é permitida.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate list items can be edited; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>para indicar os itens de lista pode ser editada; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AddNew*> method can be used to add items to the list.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AddNew*>método pode ser utilizado para adicionar itens à lista.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AddNew*>

trans-unit.source: The default value for the AllowNew property depends on the underlying data source type.
trans-unit.target: O valor predefinido para a propriedade AllowNew depende do tipo de origem de dados subjacente.

trans-unit.source: If the underlying list implements the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList> interface, this property will delegate to the underlying list.
trans-unit.target: Se a lista subjacente implementar o <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList>interface, esta propriedade irão delegar para a lista subjacente.</xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, this property will return `false` if the underlying list has any of the following characteristics: - It has a fixed size, as determined by the <xref:System.Collections.IList.IsFixedSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, irá devolver esta propriedade `false` se a lista subjacente tenha as seguintes características:-tem um tamanho fixo, conforme determinado pelo <xref:System.Collections.IList.IsFixedSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade.</xref:System.Collections.IList.IsFixedSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: - It is read-only, as determined by the <xref:System.Collections.IList.IsReadOnly%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: -É só de leitura, conforme determinado pelo <xref:System.Collections.IList.IsReadOnly%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade.</xref:System.Collections.IList.IsReadOnly%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: - The item's type does not have a default constructor.
trans-unit.target: -Tipo do item não tem um construtor predefinido.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Once the value of this property is set, the getter no longer refers the call to the underlying list.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Assim que o valor desta propriedade estiver definido, o getter já não refere-se a chamada para a lista subjacente.

trans-unit.source: Instead, it simply returns the value that was previously set until the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ResetAllowNew%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: Em vez disso, basta devolve o valor que foi anteriormente definido até o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ResetAllowNew%2A>método é chamado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ResetAllowNew%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting this property raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ListChanged> event with <xref:System.ComponentModel.ListChangedEventArgs.ListChangedType?displayProperty=fullName> set to <xref:System.ComponentModel.ListChangedType?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Definir esta propriedade desencadeia o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ListChanged>evento com <xref:System.ComponentModel.ListChangedEventArgs.ListChangedType?displayProperty=fullName>definido como <xref:System.ComponentModel.ListChangedType?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.ListChangedType?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ComponentModel.ListChangedEventArgs.ListChangedType?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ListChanged>

trans-unit.source: If you set the AllowNew property to `true` and the underlying list type does not have a default constructor, you must handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AddingNew> event and create the appropriate type.
trans-unit.target: Se definir a propriedade AllowNew para `true` e o tipo de lista subjacente não tem um construtor predefinido, deve processar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AddingNew>eventos e criar o tipo apropriado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AddingNew>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AddNew*> can be used to add items to the list; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AddNew*>pode ser utilizado para adicionar itens à lista; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AddNew*>

trans-unit.source: This property is set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> when the underlying list represented by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List*> property has a fixed size or is read-only.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade está definida como <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> quando a lista subjacente representada pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List*>propriedade tem um tamanho fixo ou é só de leitura.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List*>

trans-unit.source: The property is set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> and the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AddingNew"></xref> event is not handled when the underlying list type does not have a default constructor.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade está definida como <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> e <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AddingNew"> </xref> evento não é processado quando o tipo de lista subjacente não tem um construtor predefinido.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether items can be removed from the underlying list.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se os itens podem ser removidos da lista subjacente.

trans-unit.source: The AllowRemove property is typically used by other components to determine if editing of items in the list is allowed.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade AllowRemove é normalmente utilizada por outros componentes para determinar se a edição de itens na lista é permitida.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate list items can be removed from the list; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>para indicar a lista de itens podem ser removidos da lista; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Sorts the data source with the specified sort descriptions.
trans-unit.target: Ordena a origem de dados com as descrições de ordenação especificada.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingListView> implements multi-column sorting as a set of property descriptor-direction pairs.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingListView>implementa a ordenação de várias colunas como um conjunto de pares de direção de descritor de propriedade.</xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingListView>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescriptionCollection"></xref> containing the sort descriptions to apply to the data source.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescriptionCollection"> </xref> que contém as descrições de ordenação para aplicar à origem de dados.

trans-unit.source: The data source is not an <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IBindingListView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A origem de dados não é um <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IBindingListView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Sorts the data source using the specified property descriptor and sort direction.
trans-unit.target: Ordena a origem de dados utilizando a direção de descritor e ordenar a propriedade especificada.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList> implements single column sorting using a <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor> to indicate a property to sort by and a <xref:System.ComponentModel.ListSortDirection> indicating whether the property contents should be sorted in ascending or descending order.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList>implementa a ordenação de coluna simples utilizando um <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor>para indicar uma propriedade para ordenar por e um <xref:System.ComponentModel.ListSortDirection>que indica se o conteúdo de propriedade deve ser ordenado na ordem ascendente ou descendente.</xref:System.ComponentModel.ListSortDirection> </xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor> </xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref> that describes the property by which to sort the data source.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"> </xref> que descreve a propriedade pela qual ordenar a origem de dados.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ListSortDirection"></xref> indicating how the list should be sorted.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ListSortDirection"> </xref> que indica como a lista deverá estar ordenada.

trans-unit.source: The data source is not an <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IBindingList"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A origem de dados não é um <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IBindingList"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when all the clients have been bound to this <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando todos os clientes tenham sido vinculados a esta <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The BindingComplete event occurs after all the clients, typically controls, have been bound to the current <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>.
trans-unit.target: O evento BindingComplete ocorre após todos os clientes, normalmente controla, ter sido vinculado a atual <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>

trans-unit.source: The handler of this event can take the appropriate action based on the success, error, or exceptions in the binding process, by examining the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingCompleteEventArgs.BindingCompleteState%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingCompleteEventArgs> parameter.
trans-unit.target: O processador deste evento pode demorar a ação adequada com base no sucesso, erro ou exceções no processo de enlace, examinando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingCompleteEventArgs.BindingCompleteState%2A>propriedade o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingCompleteEventArgs>parâmetro.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingCompleteEventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingCompleteEventArgs.BindingCompleteState%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como lidar com eventos, consulte [eventos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Cancels the current edit operation.
trans-unit.target: Cancela a operação de edição atual.

trans-unit.source: This method discards modifications to data since the last save or load operation if both of the following conditions are met: - The data source implements the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableObject> interface.
trans-unit.target: Este método elimina as modificações de dados, uma vez que o último guardar ou carregar a operação se ambas as condições seguintes forem cumpridas:-a origem de dados implementa o <xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableObject>interface.</xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableObject>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.EndEdit%2A> method has not been called yet.
trans-unit.target: -O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.EndEdit%2A>método ainda não foi chamado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.EndEdit%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method calls the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager.CancelCurrentEdit%2A> method of the underlying <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager>, and is scoped to row-level changes.
trans-unit.target: Este método chama o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager.CancelCurrentEdit%2A>método subjacentes <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager>e tem um âmbito a alterações ao nível da linha.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager.CancelCurrentEdit%2A>

trans-unit.source: Removes all elements from the list.
trans-unit.target: Remove todos os elementos da lista.

trans-unit.source: The Clear method removes all elements from the underlying list represented by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List%2A> property and sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Count%2A> property to zero.
trans-unit.target: O método Clear remove todos os elementos da lista subjacente representada pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List%2A>propriedade e define o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Count%2A>propriedade como zero.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Count%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ListChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: Este método gera o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ListChanged>eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ListChanged>

trans-unit.source: Determines whether an object is an item in the list.
trans-unit.target: Determina se um objeto é um item na lista.

trans-unit.source: Although the implementation is dependent on the underlying list's `Contains` method, typically the following characteristics apply: - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List%2A> is searched starting at the first element and ending at the last element.
trans-unit.target: Embora a implementação está dependente da lista subjacente `Contains` método, normalmente, as seguintes características aplicam-se:- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List%2A>são procurados que começa no primeiro elemento e termina no último elemento.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The underlying method performs a linear search; therefore, the average execution time is proportional to the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Count%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: -O método subjacente efetua uma pesquisa linear; Por conseguinte, o tempo de execução médio é proporcional ao valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Count%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Count%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The underlying method determines equality by calling the <xref:System.Object.Equals%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: -O método subjacente determina igualdade ao chamar o <xref:System.Object.Equals%2A>método.</xref:System.Object.Equals%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> to locate in the underlying list represented by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List*> property.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Object>para localizar a lista subjacente representada pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List*>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List*> </xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: The value can be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor pode ser <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: if the value parameter is found in the ; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: Se o value parâmetro é encontrado no ; caso contrário, .

trans-unit.source: Copies the contents of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List*> to the specified array, starting at the specified index value.
trans-unit.target: Copia os conteúdos do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List*>para a matriz especificada, que começa com o valor de índice especificado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List*>

trans-unit.source: You can use this method to combine items from multiple sources into a single array.
trans-unit.target: Pode utilizar este método para combinar itens de várias origens para uma matriz única.

trans-unit.source: The destination array.
trans-unit.target: A matriz de destino.

trans-unit.source: The index in the destination array at which to start the copy operation.
trans-unit.target: O índice da matriz de destino no qual pretende iniciar a operação de cópia.

trans-unit.source: Gets the total number of items in the underlying list, taking the current <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Filter*> value into consideration.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o número total de itens na lista subjacente, tendo atual <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Filter*>valor em consideração.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Filter*>

trans-unit.source: The Count property gets the number of items in the underlying list represented by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List%2A> property as modified by the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Filter%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade contagem obtém o número de itens na lista subjacente representada pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List%2A>como modificada pelo valor de propriedade de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Filter%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Filter%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List%2A>

trans-unit.source: The total number of filtered items in the underlying list.
trans-unit.target: O número total de itens filtrados na lista subjacente.

trans-unit.source: Gets the currency manager associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o Gestor de moeda associado a este <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: If you want to access the currency manager for another binding to the same data member use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.GetRelatedCurrencyManager%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Se pretender aceder ao gestor monetário para outro enlace para a utilização de membro de dados mesmo a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.GetRelatedCurrencyManager%2A>método.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.GetRelatedCurrencyManager%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager"></xref> associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager"> </xref> associada a este <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the current item in the list.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o item atual na lista.

trans-unit.source: Use the Current property to access the current item, but use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List%2A> property to get the entire list.
trans-unit.target: Utilize a propriedade atual para aceder ao item actual, mas utiliza o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List%2A>propriedade para obter a lista completa.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List%2A>

trans-unit.source: To determine the type of the current object, use the <xref:System.Object.GetType%2A>, or <xref:System.Object.ToString%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Para determinar o tipo do objeto atual, utilize o <xref:System.Object.GetType%2A>, ou <xref:System.Object.ToString%2A>métodos.</xref:System.Object.ToString%2A> </xref:System.Object.GetType%2A>

trans-unit.source: To change the current item, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Position%2A> property to a new integral value, or use one of the navigation methods such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.MoveNext%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Para alterar o item atual, defina a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Position%2A>propriedade para um novo valor integral, ou utilizar um dos métodos de navegação, tais como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.MoveNext%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.MoveNext%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Position%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that represents the current item in the underlying list represented by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List*> property, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the list has no items.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Object>que representa o item atual na lista subjacente representada pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List*>propriedade, ou <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> se a lista tem não existem itens.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List*> </xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the currently bound item changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o item atualmente vinculado é alterado.

trans-unit.source: The CurrentChanged event is raised whenever the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Current%2A> property changes for any of the following reasons: - The current position of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List%2A> changes.
trans-unit.target: CurrentChanged evento é desencadeado sempre que o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Current%2A>de propriedade é alterado para qualquer uma das seguintes razões:-a posição atual do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List%2A>alterações.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Current%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataSource%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataMember%2A> properties change.
trans-unit.target: -O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataSource%2A>ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataMember%2A>alteração de propriedades.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataMember%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The membership of the underlying <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List%2A> changes, which causes <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Position%2A> to refer to a different item.
trans-unit.target: -A associação de subjacentes <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List%2A>alterações, as causas <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Position%2A>para fazer referência a um item de diferentes.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Position%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List%2A>

trans-unit.source: Examples include adding or deleting an item before the current item, deleting or moving the current item itself, or moving an item to the current position.
trans-unit.target: Os exemplos incluem adicionar ou eliminar um item antes do item atual, eliminar, mover o próprio item atual ou mover um item para a posição actual.

trans-unit.source: - The underlying list is refreshed by a new sorting or filtering operation.
trans-unit.target: -A lista subjacente é atualizada por uma ordenação novo ou operação de filtragem.

trans-unit.source: When this event is triggered, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Current%2A> property will already contain its new value.
trans-unit.target: Quando este evento é acionado, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Current%2A>propriedade já irá conter o novo valor.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Current%2A>

trans-unit.source: CurrentChanged is the default event for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> class.
trans-unit.target: CurrentChanged é o evento de predefinido para a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>classe.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como lidar com eventos, consulte [eventos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a property value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Current*> property has changed.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando um valor de propriedade do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Current*>propriedade foi alterado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Current*>

trans-unit.source: The CurrentItemChanged event is raised in response to all of the circumstances that raise the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.CurrentChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: O evento de CurrentItemChanged é gerado em resposta a todas as circunstâncias elevar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.CurrentChanged>eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.CurrentChanged>

trans-unit.source: Additionally, CurrentItemChanged is also fired whenever the value of one of the properties of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Current%2A> is changed.
trans-unit.target: Além disso, CurrentItemChanged também é desencadeado sempre que o valor de uma das propriedades de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Current%2A>é alterado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Current%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como lidar com eventos, consulte [eventos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a currency-related exception is silently handled by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando uma exceção de moeda silenciosamente é processada pelo <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This event is informational and reports CLS-compliant exceptions only.
trans-unit.target: Este evento é informativo e comunica apenas com exceções em conformidade com CLS.

trans-unit.source: To determine what type of exception occurred, handle this event and check the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerDataErrorEventArgs.Exception%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerDataErrorEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: Para determinar o tipo de exceção ocorreu, este evento de processar e verificar a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerDataErrorEventArgs.Exception%2A>propriedade de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerDataErrorEventArgs>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerDataErrorEventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerDataErrorEventArgs.Exception%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como lidar com eventos, consulte [eventos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the specific list in the data source to which the connector currently binds to.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a lista específica da origem de dados para o qual o conector atualmente está vinculada a.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataSource%2A> contains multiple lists (or tables) of data, you should set the DataMember property to the name of one of the sources.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataSource%2A>contém várias listas (ou tabelas) de dados, deve definir a propriedade DataMember para o nome de uma das origens.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting this property raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataMemberChanged> event
trans-unit.target: Definir esta propriedade desencadeia o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataMemberChanged>evento</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataMemberChanged>

trans-unit.source: The name of a list (or row) in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataSource*>.
trans-unit.target: O nome de uma lista (ou linha) no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataSource*>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataSource*>

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é uma cadeia vazia ("").

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataMember*> property value has changed.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataMember*>valor da propriedade foi alterado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataMember*>

trans-unit.source: The DataMemberChanged event occurs after the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataMember%2A> property changes.
trans-unit.target: O evento DataMemberChanged ocorre após o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataMember%2A>alterações de propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataMember%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como lidar com eventos, consulte [eventos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the data source that the connector binds to.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a origem de dados que o conector está vinculada a.

trans-unit.source: The DataSource property can be set to a number of data sources, including types, objects, and lists of types.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade de origem de dados pode ser definida para um número de origens de dados, incluindo os tipos, objetos e apresenta uma lista de tipos.

trans-unit.source: The resulting data source will be exposed as a list.
trans-unit.target: A origem de dados resultante ficará exposta como uma lista.

trans-unit.source: The following table shows some of the common data sources and the resulting list evaluation.
trans-unit.target: A tabela seguinte mostra algumas das origens de dados comuns e a avaliação de lista resultante.

trans-unit.source: |DataSource property|List results| |-------------------------|------------------| |`null`|An empty <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList> of objects.
trans-unit.target: | Propriedade DataSource | Lista de resultados | |-------------------------|------------------| | `null`| Vazio <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList>de objetos.</xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList>

trans-unit.source: Adding an item sets the list to the type of the added item.| |`null` with <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataMember%2A> set|Not supported, raises <xref:System.ArgumentException>.| |Non-list type or object of type "T"|Empty <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList> of type "T".| |Array instance|<xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList> containing the array elements.| |<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> instance|An <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList> containing the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> items.| |List instance containing type "T"|<xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList> instance containing type "T".| In addition, DataSource can be set to other list types such as <xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource> and <xref:System.ComponentModel.ITypedList> and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> will handle them appropriately.
trans-unit.target: Adicionar um item define a lista para o tipo de item adicionado. | | `null` com <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataMember%2A>defina | Não suportado, gera <xref:System.ArgumentException>. | | Tipo de lista não ou o objeto do tipo "T" | Vazio <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList>do tipo "T". | | Instância de matriz | <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList>que contém os elementos de matriz. | | instância <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>| Um <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList>que contêm os itens de <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>. | | Instância de lista que contém o tipo "T" | instância <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList>que contém o tipo "T". | Além disso, DataSource pode de ser definido para outros tipos de lista, tais como <xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource>e <xref:System.ComponentModel.ITypedList>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>processará-las adequadamente.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> </xref:System.ComponentModel.ITypedList> </xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource> </xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> </xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> </xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList> </xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList> </xref:System.ArgumentException> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataMember%2A>

trans-unit.source: In this case, the type contained in the list should have a default constructor.
trans-unit.target: Neste caso, o tipo contido na lista deve ter um construtor predefinido.

trans-unit.source: When setting a data source, if the supplied reference contains more than one list or table, you must set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataMember%2A> property to a string that specifies the list to bind to.
trans-unit.target: Ao definir uma origem de dados, se a referência fornecida contém mais do que uma lista ou tabela, tem de definir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataMember%2A>propriedade numa cadeia que especifica a lista à qual vincular.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataMember%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting this property raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataSourceChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: Definição desta propriedade gera o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataSourceChanged>eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataSourceChanged>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If you make any changes to the DataSource property value, you should do so on the user interface (UI) thread to ensure that the UI reflects the changes.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Se efetuar alterações para o valor da propriedade da origem de dados, deve fazê-no thread de interface (IU) do utilizador para se certificar de que a IU reflete as alterações.

trans-unit.source: The DataSource property is the default property for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> class.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade de origem de dados é a propriedade predefinida para a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>classe.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that acts as a data source.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Object>que age como uma origem de dados.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataSource*> property value has changed.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataSource*>valor da propriedade foi alterado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataSource*>

trans-unit.source: The DataSourceChanged event occurs after the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataSource%2A> property changes.
trans-unit.target: O evento DataSourceChanged ocorre após o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataSource%2A>alterações de propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como lidar com eventos, consulte [eventos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource"></xref> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Liberta os recursos não geridos utilizados pelo <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource"> </xref> e opcionalmente liberta os recursos geridos.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose` method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Este método é denominado pelo público `Dispose` método e o <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>método.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: `Dispose` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose`invoca protegida `Dispose(Boolean)` método com o `disposing` parâmetro definido como `true`.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>invoca `Dispose` com `disposing` definido como `false`.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> references.
trans-unit.target: Quando o `disposing` parâmetro for true, este método versões retidos por quaisquer objetos geridos de todos os recursos que este <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>referências.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: Este método invoca o `Dispose` método de cada objeto referenciado.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Para libertar recursos geridos e; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> para libertar recursos apenas não geridos.

trans-unit.source: Applies pending changes to the underlying data source.
trans-unit.target: Aplica-se as alterações pendentes para a origem de dados subjacente.

trans-unit.source: When the EndEdit method is called, all pending changes are applied to the underlying data source.
trans-unit.target: Quando se chama o método EndEdit, todas as alterações pendentes são aplicadas à origem de dados subjacente.

trans-unit.source: This method has no effect unless the objects contained by the data source implement the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableObject> interface.
trans-unit.target: Este método não tem qualquer efeito exceto se os objetos contidos pela origem de dados implementam o <xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableObject>interface.</xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableObject>

trans-unit.source: If the objects do not implement the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableObject> interface, changes to the data are copied to the underlying data source immediately after each change.
trans-unit.target: Se os objetos não implementam a <xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableObject>interface, as alterações dos dados são copiados para a origem de dados subjacente imediatamente após cada alteração.</xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableObject>

trans-unit.source: This method raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ListChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: Este método gera o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ListChanged>eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ListChanged>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the expression used to filter which rows are viewed.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a expressão utilizada para filtrar as linhas são visualizadas.

trans-unit.source: Typically used in complex data-binding scenarios, the Filter property allows you to view a subset of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataSource%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente utilizado em cenários de enlace de dados complexos, a propriedade de filtro permite-lhe visualizar um subconjunto de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataSource%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: Only underlying lists that implement the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingListView> interface support filtering.
trans-unit.target: Apenas subjacente apresenta uma lista que implementa o <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingListView>filtragem de suporte de interface.</xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingListView>

trans-unit.source: When Filter is not `null`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> passes this property to the underlying list.
trans-unit.target: Quando o filtro não é `null`, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>passa a esta propriedade para a lista subjacente.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>

trans-unit.source: If you set this property during object initialization, the call will be deferred until after initialization is complete.
trans-unit.target: Se definir esta propriedade durante a inicialização do objeto, a chamada será adiada até após a conclusão da inicialização.

trans-unit.source: To form a filter value, specify the name of a column followed by an operator and a value to filter on.
trans-unit.target: Para formar um valor de filtro, especifique o nome de uma coluna seguido de um operador e um valor a filtrar.

trans-unit.source: The accepted filter syntax depends on the underlying data source.
trans-unit.target: A sintaxe de filtro aceite depende da origem de dados subjacente.

trans-unit.source: If the underlying data source is a <xref:System.Data.DataSet>, <xref:System.Data.DataTable>, or <xref:System.Data.DataView>, you can specify Boolean expressions using the syntax documented for the <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.Expression%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Se a origem de dados subjacente é um <xref:System.Data.DataSet>, <xref:System.Data.DataTable>, ou <xref:System.Data.DataView>, pode especificar expressões utilizando a sintaxe indicada o <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.Expression%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade.</xref:System.Data.DataColumn.Expression%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Data.DataView> </xref:System.Data.DataTable> </xref:System.Data.DataSet>

trans-unit.source: The value of the Filter property affects the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Count%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O valor da propriedade filtro afeta o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Count%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Count%2A>

trans-unit.source: Additionally, the Filter value will persist when the data source changes.
trans-unit.target: Além disso, o valor do filtro será mantido quando a origem de dados alterações.

trans-unit.source: To stop filtering the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataSource%2A>, call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.RemoveFilter%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para parar a filtragem de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataSource%2A>, chame o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.RemoveFilter%2A>método.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.RemoveFilter%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: A string that specifies how rows are to be filtered.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia que especifica a forma como as linhas devem ser filtrados.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Searches for the index of the item that has the given property descriptor.
trans-unit.target: Procura o índice do item que tem o descritor de propriedade especificada.

trans-unit.source: This method is typically used in complex data-binding cases to locate the first row where the value of the field specified by the `prop` parameter equals the value of the `key` parameter This method simply refers the request to the underlying list's <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.Find%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: Este método é normalmente utilizado em casos de enlace de dados complexos para localizar a primeira linha em que o valor do campo especificado pelo `prop` parâmetro igual ao valor da `key` parâmetro este método simplesmente refere-se o pedido para a lista subjacente <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.Find%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método.</xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.Find%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For example, if the underlying data source is a <xref:System.Data.DataSet>, <xref:System.Data.DataTable>, or <xref:System.Data.DataView>, this method calls the <xref:System.Data.DataView.System%23ComponentModel%23IBindingList%23Find%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se a origem de dados subjacente é um <xref:System.Data.DataSet>, <xref:System.Data.DataTable>, ou <xref:System.Data.DataView>, este método chama o <xref:System.Data.DataView.System%23ComponentModel%23IBindingList%23Find%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método.</xref:System.Data.DataView.System%23ComponentModel%23IBindingList%23Find%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Data.DataView> </xref:System.Data.DataTable> </xref:System.Data.DataSet>

trans-unit.source: The behavior of <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.Find%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, such as the value returned if no matching item is found, depends on the implementation of the method in the underlying list.
trans-unit.target: O comportamento de <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.Find%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, tais como o valor devolvido se não for encontrado nenhum item correspondente, depende a implementação do método na lista subjacente.</xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.Find%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref> to search for.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"> </xref> para procurar.

trans-unit.source: The value of `prop` to match.
trans-unit.target: O valor de `prop` para corresponder.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the item that has the given value for <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O índice baseado em zero do item que tem o valor indicado para <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The underlying list is not of type <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IBindingList"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A lista subjacente não é do tipo <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IBindingList"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns the index of the item in the list with the specified property name and value.
trans-unit.target: Devolve o índice do item na lista com o nome de propriedade especificado e o valor.

trans-unit.source: The Find method can only be used when the underlying list is an <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList> with searching implemented.
trans-unit.target: O método de localizar só pode ser utilizado quando a lista subjacente é um <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList>com pesquisar implementado.</xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList>

trans-unit.source: This method simply refers the request to the underlying list's <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.Find%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: Este método simplesmente refere-se o pedido para a lista subjacente <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.Find%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método.</xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.Find%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For example, if the underlying data source is a <xref:System.Data.DataSet>, <xref:System.Data.DataTable>, or <xref:System.Data.DataView>, this method converts `propertyName` to a <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor> and calls the <xref:System.Data.DataView.System%23ComponentModel%23IBindingList%23Find%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se a origem de dados subjacente é um <xref:System.Data.DataSet>, <xref:System.Data.DataTable>, ou <xref:System.Data.DataView>, este método converte `propertyName` para um <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor>e chama o <xref:System.Data.DataView.System%23ComponentModel%23IBindingList%23Find%2A>método.</xref:System.Data.DataView.System%23ComponentModel%23IBindingList%23Find%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor> </xref:System.Data.DataView> </xref:System.Data.DataTable> </xref:System.Data.DataSet>

trans-unit.source: The behavior of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Find%2A>, such as the value returned if no matching item is found, depends on the implementation of the method in the underlying list.
