trans-unit.target: O comportamento de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Find%2A>, tais como o valor devolvido se não for encontrado nenhum item correspondente, depende a implementação do método na lista subjacente.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Find%2A>

trans-unit.source: The property name comparison is case-insensitive.
trans-unit.target: A comparação do nome de propriedade é sensível.

trans-unit.source: The name of the property to search for.
trans-unit.target: O nome da propriedade para procurar.

trans-unit.source: The value of the item with the specified `propertyName` to find.
trans-unit.target: O valor do item com especificado `propertyName` localizar.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the item with the specified property name and value.
trans-unit.target: O índice baseado em zero do item com o nome de propriedade especificado e o valor.

trans-unit.source: The underlying list is not a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IBindingList"></xref> with searching functionality implemented.
trans-unit.target: A lista subjacente não é um <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IBindingList"> </xref> com pesquisar funcionalidade implementada.

trans-unit.source: propertyName does not match a property in the list.
trans-unit.target: propertyNamenão corresponde a uma propriedade na lista.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves an enumerator for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List*>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um enumerador de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List*>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List*>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List*>.
trans-unit.target: Uma <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>para <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List*>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List*> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>

trans-unit.source: Retrieves an array of <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref> objects representing the bindable properties of the data source list type.

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref> objects that represents the properties on this list type used to bind data.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz de <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"> </xref> objetos que representa as propriedades neste tipo de lista utilizada para o enlace de dados.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the list supplying data for the binding.

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref> objects to find in the list as bindable.

trans-unit.source: The name of the list supplying the data for binding.
trans-unit.target: O nome da lista de fornecer os dados para o enlace.

trans-unit.source: Gets the related currency manager for the specified data member.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o Gestor de moeda relacionadas para o membro de dados especificada.

trans-unit.source: If `dataMember` is `null` or an empty string (""), GetRelatedCurrencyManager returns the main currency manager; otherwise, it checks for another <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> bound to the specified data member and returns its currency manager.
trans-unit.target: Se `dataMember` é `null` ou uma cadeia vazia (""), GetRelatedCurrencyManager devolve o Gestor de moeda principal utilizada pela; caso contrário, verifica a existência de outro <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>vinculado para o membro de dados especificado e devolve o Gestor de moeda.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>

trans-unit.source: The name of column or list, within the data source to retrieve the currency manager for.
trans-unit.target: O nome da coluna ou uma lista, dentro origem de dados para obter o Gestor de moeda.

trans-unit.source: The related <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager"></xref> for the specified data member.
trans-unit.target: O relacionados <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager"> </xref> para o membro de dados especificada.

trans-unit.source: Searches for the specified object and returns the index of the first occurrence within the entire list.
trans-unit.target: Pesquisa para o objeto especificado e devolve o índice da primeira ocorrência na lista de toda.

trans-unit.source: Although the implementation is dependent on the underlying list's `IndexOf` method, typically the following characteristics apply: - The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List%2A> is searched starting at the first element and ending at the last element.
trans-unit.target: Embora a implementação está dependente da lista subjacente `IndexOf` método, normalmente, as seguintes características aplicam-se: - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List%2A>são procurados que começa no primeiro elemento e termina no último elemento.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The underlying method performs a linear search; therefore, the average execution time is proportional to the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Count%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: -O método subjacente efetua uma pesquisa linear; Por conseguinte, o tempo de execução médio é proporcional ao valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Count%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Count%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The underlying method determines equality by calling the <xref:System.Object.Equals%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: -O método subjacente determina igualdade ao chamar o <xref:System.Object.Equals%2A>método.</xref:System.Object.Equals%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> to locate in the underlying list represented by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List*> property.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Object>para localizar a lista subjacente representada pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List*>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List*> </xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.target: O valor pode ser <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.target: O índice baseado em zero da primeira ocorrência da value parâmetro; caso contrário, -1 se value não se encontra na lista.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the underlying list has a fixed size.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se a lista subjacente tem um tamanho fixo.

trans-unit.source: If the list has a fixed size, it does not allow the addition or removal of elements after the list has been created, but you can modify existing elements.
trans-unit.target: Se a lista tem um tamanho fixo, não permite a adição ou remoção de elementos depois de ter sido criada na lista, mas pode modificar elementos existentes.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the underlying list has a fixed size; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a lista subjacente tem um tamanho fixo; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the underlying list is read-only.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se a lista subjacente é só de leitura.

trans-unit.source: A list that is read-only does not allow the addition, removal, or modification of any list items after the list is created.
trans-unit.target: Uma lista que é só de leitura não permite a adição, remoção ou modificação de quaisquer itens de lista depois de criar na lista.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the list is read-only; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the items in the underlying list are sorted.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se os itens na lista subjacente são ordenados.

trans-unit.source: IsSorted always returns `false` if the list is not an <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList>.
trans-unit.target: IsSorted sempre devolve `false` se a lista não é um <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList>

trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a lista é uma <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IBindingList"> </xref> e é ordenado; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether access to the collection is synchronized (thread safe).
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o acesso à coleção está sincronizado (seguros para threads).

trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>para indicar a lista está sincronizada; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the list element at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o elemento de lista no índice especificado.

trans-unit.source: The Item property represents the indexer for this class.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade do Item representa o indexador para esta classe.

trans-unit.source: It accepts `null` as a valid value and allows duplicate items within the list.
trans-unit.target: Aceita `null` como um valor válido e permite que os itens duplicados na lista.

trans-unit.source: Setting a value will raise the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ListChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: Definição de um valor irá elevar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ListChanged>eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ListChanged>

trans-unit.target: O índice baseado em zero do elemento para obter.

trans-unit.target: O elemento no índice especificado.

trans-unit.source: Gets the list that the connector is bound to.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a lista que o conector está vinculado ao.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> class uniformly handles different data sources.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>classe uniformemente processa origens de dados diferentes.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>

trans-unit.source: Ideally the List property should be set to a general <xref:System.Collections.IList>.
trans-unit.target: Idealmente, a propriedade de lista deve ser definida como um geral <xref:System.Collections.IList>.</xref:System.Collections.IList>

trans-unit.source: However, sometimes it may be necessary to cast this property to a more specific type.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, por vezes, poderá ser necessário converter esta propriedade para um tipo mais específico.

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the underlying list type, which depends on the type or value of the data source.
trans-unit.target: A tabela seguinte mostra o tipo de lista subjacente, o que depende do tipo ou valor da origem de dados.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IList> that represents the list, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if there is no underlying list associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the underlying list changes or an item in the list changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando as alterações de lista subjacente ou um item na lista de alterações.

trans-unit.source: The ListChanged event occurs when there is a change to the membership or metadata of the underlying list represented by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O evento ListChanged ocorre quando existe uma alteração de associação ou metadados da lista subjacente representada pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, this event is raised when items are added, removed, or moved, or the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataSource%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataMember%2A> properties change.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, este evento é desencadeado quando os itens são adicionados, removidos ou movidos, ou o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataSource%2A>ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataMember%2A>alteração de propriedades.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataMember%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: The values of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Sort%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Filter%2A> properties will persist when this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Os valores de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Sort%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Filter%2A>propriedades serão mantidas quando este evento ocorre.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Filter%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Sort%2A>

trans-unit.source: This event can be completely suppressed by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.RaiseListChangedEvents%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Este evento pode ser completamente suprimido, definindo o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.RaiseListChangedEvents%2A>propriedade `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.RaiseListChangedEvents%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como lidar com eventos, consulte [eventos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Moves to the first item in the list.
trans-unit.target: Mover para o primeiro item na lista.

trans-unit.source: Changes the current value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Position%2A> property to 0, the first item in the underlying data source.
trans-unit.target: Altera o valor atual do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Position%2A>propriedade como 0, o primeiro item na origem de dados subjacente.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Position%2A>

trans-unit.source: Moves to the last item in the list.
trans-unit.target: Passa para o último item na lista.

trans-unit.source: Changes the current value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Position%2A> property to the index of the last item in the underlying data source, which is equal to the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Count%2A> property minus 1.
trans-unit.target: Altera o valor atual do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Position%2A>propriedade para o índice do último item na origem de dados subjacente, que é igual ao valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Count%2A>propriedade menos 1.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Count%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Position%2A>

trans-unit.source: Moves to the next item in the list.
trans-unit.target: Mover para o seguinte item na lista.

trans-unit.source: Changes the current value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Position%2A> property to the next item in the underlying data source.
trans-unit.target: Altera o valor atual do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Position%2A>propriedade para o item seguinte da origem de dados subjacente.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Position%2A>

trans-unit.source: Moves to the previous item in the list.
trans-unit.target: Mover para o item na lista anterior.

trans-unit.source: This method changes the current value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Position%2A> property to the previous item in the underlying data source.
trans-unit.target: Este método altera o valor atual do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Position%2A>propriedade ao item anterior da origem de dados subjacente.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Position%2A>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AddingNew"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AddingNew"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Gerar um evento invoca o processador de eventos através de um delegado.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [eventos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The OnAddingNew method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: O método OnAddingNew também permite que as classes derivadas processar o evento sem ligação de um delegado.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Este é a preferido técnica para processar o evento de uma classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.EventArgs>que contém os dados do evento.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.BindingComplete"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.BindingComplete"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Gerar um evento invoca o processador de eventos através de um delegado.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [eventos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The OnBindingComplete method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the index of the current item in the underlying list.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o índice do item atual na lista subjacente.

trans-unit.source: When setting the Position property, out-of-range values are treated in the following manner: - Negative values are treated as 0.
trans-unit.target: Ao definir a propriedade de posição, valores fora do intervalo são tratados da seguinte forma:-valores negativos são tratados como 0.

trans-unit.source: - Values greater than or equal to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Count%2A> are treated as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Count%2A> minus 1.
trans-unit.target: -Valores maiores que ou iguais a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Count%2A>são tratadas como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Count%2A>menos 1.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Count%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Count%2A>

trans-unit.source: Changing the Position property will adjust the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Current%2A> property likewise.
trans-unit.target: Alterar a propriedade Position irá ajustar a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Current%2A>propriedade da mesma forma.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Current%2A>

trans-unit.source: A zero-based index that specifies the position of the current item in the underlying list.
trans-unit.target: Um índice baseado em zero que especifica a posição do item atual na lista subjacente.

trans-unit.target: Quando a propriedade de RaiseListChangedEvents é `false`, suspende a gerar de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ListChanged>eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ListChanged>

trans-unit.source: This event indicates that the bound list has been modified in some way, including adding, deleting, inserting, or modifying items.
trans-unit.target: Este evento indica que a lista está vinculada foi modificada de alguma forma, incluindo a adição, eliminação, inserir ou modificação de itens.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ListChanged"></xref> events should be raised; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ListChanged"> </xref> eventos devem ser gerado; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified item from the list.
trans-unit.target: Remove o item especificado na lista.

trans-unit.source: The Remove method causes the list to be searched for the `value` parameter.
trans-unit.target: O método de remover faz com que a lista para ser pesquisadas para a `value` parâmetro.

trans-unit.source: If found, this method will attempt to remove the item from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Se encontrar, este método irá tentar remover o item da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List%2A>

trans-unit.source: This attempt will fail if the list has a fixed size or is read-only.
trans-unit.target: Esta tentativa irá falhar se a lista tem um tamanho fixo ou é só de leitura.

trans-unit.source: These two conditions can be tested with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.IsFixedSize%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.IsReadOnly%2A> properties, respectively.
trans-unit.target: Estas duas condições podem ser testadas com o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.IsFixedSize%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.IsReadOnly%2A>Propriedades, respetivamente.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.IsReadOnly%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.IsFixedSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ListChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: Este método gera o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ListChanged>eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ListChanged>

trans-unit.source: The item to remove from the underlying list represented by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List*> property.
trans-unit.target: O item a remover da lista subjacente representada pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List*>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List*>

trans-unit.source: The underlying list has a fixed size or is read-only.
trans-unit.target: A lista subjacente tem um tamanho fixo ou é só de leitura.

trans-unit.source: Removes the item at the specified index in the list.
trans-unit.target: Remove o item no índice especificado na lista.

trans-unit.source: These two conditions can be tested with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.IsFixedSize%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.IsReadOnly%2A> properties, respectively.
trans-unit.target: Estas duas condições podem ser testadas com o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.IsFixedSize%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.IsReadOnly%2A>Propriedades, respetivamente.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.IsReadOnly%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.IsFixedSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ListChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: Este método gera o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ListChanged>eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ListChanged>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the item to remove.
trans-unit.target: O índice baseado em zero do item a remover.

trans-unit.source: index is less than zero or greater than the value of the property.
trans-unit.target: indexé menor que zero ou superior ao valor da propriedade.

trans-unit.source: The underlying list represented by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List*> property is read-only or has a fixed size.
trans-unit.target: A lista subjacente representada pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List*>propriedade é só de leitura ou tem um tamanho fixo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List*>

trans-unit.source: Removes the current item from the list.
trans-unit.target: Remove o item atual na lista.

trans-unit.source: The RemoveCurrent method is equivalent to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.RemoveAt%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: O método RemoveCurrent é equivalente à <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.RemoveAt%2A>método.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.RemoveAt%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AllowRemove*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>. -or- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Position*> is less than zero or greater than <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Count*>.
trans-unit.target: The <>*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>. - ou - <> </> *> é menor que zero ou superior a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Count*>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Count*>

trans-unit.source: The underlying list represented by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List*> property is read-only or has a fixed size.
trans-unit.target: A lista subjacente representada pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List*>propriedade é só de leitura ou tem um tamanho fixo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List*>

trans-unit.source: Removes the filter associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Remove o filtro associado a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The RemoveFilter method refers the request to the underlying list's <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingListView.RemoveFilter%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: O método RemoveFilter refere-se o pedido para a lista subjacente <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingListView.RemoveFilter%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método.</xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingListView.RemoveFilter%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Only lists that implement <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingListView> support filtering.
trans-unit.target: Apenas lista que implemente <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingListView>suporta filtragem.</xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingListView>

trans-unit.source: By default, a call to this method is equivalent to setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Filter%2A> property to `null`.
trans-unit.target: Por predefinição, uma chamada para este método é equivalente à definição de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Filter%2A>propriedade `null`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Filter%2A>

trans-unit.source: The underlying list does not support filtering.
trans-unit.target: A lista subjacente não suporta filtragem.

trans-unit.source: Removes the sort associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Remove a ordenação associada a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The RemoveSort method refers the request to the underlying list's <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.RemoveSort%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: O método RemoveSort refere-se o pedido para a lista subjacente <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.RemoveSort%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método.</xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.RemoveSort%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Only lists that implement <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList> support sorting.
trans-unit.target: Apenas lista que implemente <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList>suporta a ordenação.</xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList>

trans-unit.source: By default, a call to this method is equivalent to setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Sort%2A> property to `null`.
trans-unit.target: Por predefinição, uma chamada para este método é equivalente à definição de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Sort%2A>propriedade `null`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Sort%2A>

trans-unit.source: The underlying list does not support sorting.
trans-unit.target: A lista subjacente não suporta ordenação.

trans-unit.source: Reinitializes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AllowNew*> property.
trans-unit.target: Reinicializa a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AllowNew*>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AllowNew*>

trans-unit.source: The ResetAllowNew method reinitializes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AllowNew%2A> property to reflect the value of the corresponding <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AllowNew%2A> property in the underlying list.
trans-unit.target: O método ResetAllowNew reinicializa a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AllowNew%2A>propriedade para refletir o valor correspondente <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AllowNew%2A>propriedade na lista subjacente.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AllowNew%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AllowNew%2A>

trans-unit.source: Causes a control bound to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource"></xref> to reread all the items in the list and refresh their displayed values.
trans-unit.target: Faz com que um controlo vinculado ao <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource"> </xref> reread todos os itens na lista e atualizar os respetivos valores apresentados.

trans-unit.source: The ResetBindings method informs all controls bound to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> to refresh their values.
trans-unit.target: O método ResetBindings informa todos os controlos vinculados ao <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>para atualizar os respetivos valores.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>

trans-unit.source: The method does this by raising the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ListChanged> event at least once; the `metaDataChanged` parameter indicates the nature of the underlying change.
trans-unit.target: O método efetua este procedimento ao gerar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ListChanged>eventos, pelo menos, uma vez; o `metaDataChanged` parâmetro indica a natureza da alteração subjacente.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ListChanged>

trans-unit.source: - A `metaDataChanged` value of `true` indicates that the data schema of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> has changed.
trans-unit.target: -A `metaDataChanged` valor `true` indica que o esquema de dados de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>foi alterada.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ListChanged> event is raised with <xref:System.ComponentModel.ListChangedEventArgs.ListChangedType?displayProperty=fullName> set to <xref:System.ComponentModel.ListChangedType?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ListChanged>evento é gerado com <xref:System.ComponentModel.ListChangedEventArgs.ListChangedType?displayProperty=fullName>definido como <xref:System.ComponentModel.ListChangedType?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.ListChangedType?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ComponentModel.ListChangedEventArgs.ListChangedType?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ListChanged>

trans-unit.source: - A `metaDataChanged` value of `false` indicates that only the values of one or more items have changed.
trans-unit.target: -A `metaDataChanged` valor `false` indica que apenas os valores de um ou mais itens foram alterados.

trans-unit.source: Regardless of the value of `metaDataChanged`, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ListChanged> event is raised with <xref:System.ComponentModel.ListChangedEventArgs.ListChangedType?displayProperty=fullName> set to <xref:System.ComponentModel.ListChangedType?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Independentemente do valor de `metaDataChanged`, um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ListChanged>evento é gerado com <xref:System.ComponentModel.ListChangedEventArgs.ListChangedType?displayProperty=fullName>definido como <xref:System.ComponentModel.ListChangedType?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.ListChangedType?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ComponentModel.ListChangedEventArgs.ListChangedType?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ListChanged>

trans-unit.source: As a consequence, calling ResetBindings with a parameter of `true` will raise two <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ListChanged> events.
trans-unit.target: Como consequence, chamar ResetBindings com um parâmetro de `true` emitirá dois <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ListChanged>eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ListChanged>

trans-unit.source: ResetBindings is automatically called whenever another member makes major changes to the data-binding, such as setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataSource%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataMember%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: ResetBindings automaticamente denomina-se sempre que o outro membro faz alterações principais para o enlace de dados, tais como a definição de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataSource%2A>ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataMember%2A>Propriedades.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataMember%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: However, the programmer can also call this method explicitly.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, o programador pode também chamar este método explicitamente.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the data schema has changed; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if only values have changed.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se tiver alterado o esquema de dados; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> se apenas os valores foram alterados.

trans-unit.source: Causes a control bound to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource"></xref> to reread the currently selected item and refresh its displayed value.
trans-unit.target: Faz com que um controlo vinculado ao <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource"> </xref> reread do item atualmente selecionado e atualize o valor apresentado.

trans-unit.source: Calling this method will cause the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ListChanged> event to occur, specifying the item changed at the current position.
trans-unit.target: Chamar este método irá fazer com que o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ListChanged>evento ocorra, especificar o item foi alterado na posição atual.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ListChanged>

trans-unit.source: Causes a control bound to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource"></xref> to reread the item at the specified index, and refresh its displayed value.
trans-unit.target: Faz com que um controlo vinculado ao <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource"> </xref> reread o item no índice especificado e atualize o valor apresentado.

trans-unit.source: The ResetItem method notifies all controls bound to the item at the specified <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Position%2A> to refresh their values.
trans-unit.target: O método ResetItem notifica todos os controlos vinculados ao item especificado no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Position%2A>para atualizar os respetivos valores.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Position%2A>

trans-unit.source: The method does this by raising the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ListChanged> event with <xref:System.ComponentModel.ListChangedEventArgs.ListChangedType?displayProperty=fullName> set to <xref:System.ComponentModel.ListChangedType?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: O método efetua este procedimento ao gerar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ListChanged>evento com <xref:System.ComponentModel.ListChangedEventArgs.ListChangedType?displayProperty=fullName>definido como <xref:System.ComponentModel.ListChangedType?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.ListChangedType?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ComponentModel.ListChangedEventArgs.ListChangedType?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ListChanged>

trans-unit.source: ResetItem is automatically called whenever changes are made to the value of an individual item.
trans-unit.target: ResetItem automaticamente chama-se sempre que são efetuadas alterações ao valor de um item individuais.

trans-unit.source: However, the programmer can also call this method explicitly.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, o programador pode também chamar este método explicitamente.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the item that has changed.
trans-unit.target: O índice baseado em zero do item que foi alterado.

trans-unit.source: Resumes data binding.
trans-unit.target: Retoma o enlace de dados.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.SuspendBinding%2A> and ResumeBinding are two methods that allow the temporary suspension and resumption of data binding in a simple-binding scenario.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.SuspendBinding%2A>e ResumeBinding dois métodos que permitem que a suspensão temporário e recomeço de enlace de dados num cenário de enlace simples.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.SuspendBinding%2A>

trans-unit.source: You would typically suspend data binding if the user must be allowed to make several edits to data fields before validation occurs.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, seria suspender o enlace de dados se o utilizador tem permissão para efetuar várias edições aos campos de dados antes de ocorre a validação.

trans-unit.source: For example, if one field must be changed in accordance with a second, but where validating the first field would cause the second field to be in error.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se um campo tem de ser alterado de acordo com um segundo, mas em que a validar o primeiro campo fará com que o campo de segundo estar num erro.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Using <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.SuspendBinding%2A> prevents changes from being pushed into the data source until ResumeBinding is called, but does not actually prevent any events from occurring.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Using <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.SuspendBinding%2A>impede que as alterações que está a ser enviado para a origem de dados até ResumeBinding é chamado, mas não, na verdade, impedir que os eventos ocorram.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.SuspendBinding%2A>

trans-unit.source: Controls that use complex data binding, such as the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control, update their values based on change events such as the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager.ListChanged> event, so calling <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.SuspendBinding%2A> will not prevent them from receiving changes to the data source.
trans-unit.target: Controlos que utilizam o enlace de dados complexas, tais como o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>controlar, atualize os respetivos valores com base em eventos de alteração, tais como o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager.ListChanged>eventos, por isso, ao chamar <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.SuspendBinding%2A>impedirá não de receber as alterações à origem de dados.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.SuspendBinding%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager.ListChanged> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: For this reason, this <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.SuspendBinding%2A> and ResumeBinding are designed for use with simple-bound controls, such as the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control.
trans-unit.target: Por este motivo, este <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.SuspendBinding%2A>e ResumeBinding foram concebidas para utilização com controlos vinculados a simples, tais como o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.SuspendBinding%2A>

trans-unit.source: Alternatively you can use these methods in a complex binding scenario if you suppress <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ListChanged> events by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.RaiseListChangedEvents%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Em alternativa, pode utilizar estes métodos num cenário de enlace complexas se pode suprimir <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ListChanged>eventos definindo a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.RaiseListChangedEvents%2A>propriedade `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.RaiseListChangedEvents%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ListChanged>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the column names used for sorting, and the sort order for viewing the rows in the data source.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define os nomes de colunas utilizados para ordenação e a sequência de ordenação para ver as linhas da origem de dados.

trans-unit.source: The Sort property is a case-sensitive string that specifies the column names used to sort the rows, along with the sort direction.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade de ordenação é uma cadeia de maiúsculas e minúsculas que especifica os nomes de coluna utilizados para ordenar as linhas, juntamente com a direção de ordenação.

trans-unit.source: Columns are sorted ascending by default.
trans-unit.target: As colunas são ordenadas por ascendente por predefinição.

trans-unit.source: Multiple columns can be separated by commas, such as `"State, ZipCode DESC"`.
trans-unit.target: Várias colunas podem ser separadas por vírgulas, tais como `"State, ZipCode DESC"`.

trans-unit.source: To support sorting, the underlying list must implement the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList> or <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingListView> interfaces.
trans-unit.target: Para suportar a ordenação, a lista subjacente tem de implementar o <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList>ou <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingListView>interfaces.</xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingListView> </xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList>

trans-unit.source: This capability can be queried through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.SupportsSorting%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Esta capacidade pode ser consultada através de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.SupportsSorting%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.SupportsSorting%2A>

trans-unit.source: Multicolumn sorting is available when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.SupportsAdvancedSorting%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: A ordenação largura está disponível de quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.SupportsAdvancedSorting%2A>propriedade é `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.SupportsAdvancedSorting%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting the Sort property will change the internal list depending on its type: - If the list is of type <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList>, the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.SortProperty%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.SortDirection%2A?displayProperty=fullName> properties are set in the internal list.
trans-unit.target: Definir a propriedade de ordenação alterará a lista interna, consoante o tipo: - se a lista é do tipo <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList>, a <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.SortProperty%2A?displayProperty=fullName>e <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.SortDirection%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedades forem definidas pela lista interna.</xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.SortDirection%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.SortProperty%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList>

trans-unit.source: - If the list is of type <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingListView>, the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingListView.SortDescriptions%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is set.
trans-unit.target: -Se a lista é do tipo <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingListView>, a <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingListView.SortDescriptions%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade está definida.</xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingListView.SortDescriptions%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingListView>

trans-unit.source: The internal list's sort properties are only changed when the sort string is not `null`.
trans-unit.target: Propriedades de ordenação a lista interna apenas são alteradas quando a cadeia de ordenação não é `null`.

trans-unit.source: The `get` accessor for this property will not retrieve the sort value of the internal list; instead, it will return the `set` accessor value.
trans-unit.target: O `get` acessor para esta propriedade não irá obter o valor de ordenação da lista interna; em vez disso, irá devolver o `set` valor acessor.

trans-unit.source: The value of the Sort property will persist when the data source changes.
trans-unit.target: O valor da propriedade de ordenação serão mantidas quando a origem de dados alterações.

trans-unit.source: A case-sensitive string containing the column name followed by "ASC" (for ascending) or "DESC" (for descending).
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de maiúsculas e minúsculas que contém o nome de coluna seguido por "ASC" (para ascendente) ou "DESC" (para descendente).

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of sort descriptions applied to the data source.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a coleção de ordenação descrições aplicadas à origem de dados.

trans-unit.source: If the list is not an <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingListView>, the SortDescriptions always returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: Se a lista não é um <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingListView>, as SortDescriptions sempre devolve `null`.</xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingListView>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescriptionCollection> is a read-only collection.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescriptionCollection>é uma coleção só de leitura.</xref:System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescriptionCollection>

trans-unit.source: If the data source is an <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IBindingListView"></xref>, a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescriptionCollection"></xref> that contains the sort descriptions applied to the list; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Se a origem de dados é um <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IBindingListView"> </xref>, um <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescriptionCollection"> </xref> que contém as descrições de ordenação aplicadas à lista; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the direction the items in the list are sorted.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a direção que os itens na lista são ordenados.

trans-unit.source: If the underlying list is not an <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList>, the SortDirection property will always return <xref:System.ComponentModel.ListSortDirection>.
trans-unit.target: Se a lista subjacente não é um <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList>a propriedade SortDirection devolverá sempre <xref:System.ComponentModel.ListSortDirection>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.ListSortDirection> </xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ListSortDirection"></xref> values indicating the direction the list is sorted.
trans-unit.target: Um do <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ListSortDirection"> </xref> valores que indica a direção que a lista é ordenada.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref> that is being used for sorting the list.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"> </xref> que está a ser utilizado para ordenar a lista.

trans-unit.source: If the list is not an <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList>, SortProperty always returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: Se a lista não é um <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList>, SortProperty sempre devolve `null`.</xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList>

trans-unit.source: If the list is an <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IBindingList"></xref>, the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref> that is being used for sorting; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Se a lista é uma <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IBindingList"> </xref>, a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"> </xref> que está a ser utilizado para ordenação; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the data source supports multi-column sorting.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se a origem de dados suporta a ordenação de várias colunas.

trans-unit.source: If the list is not an <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingListView>, SupportsAdvancedSorting always returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: Se a lista não é um <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingListView>, SupportsAdvancedSorting sempre devolve `false`.</xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingListView>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the list is an <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IBindingListView"></xref> and supports multi-column sorting; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a lista é uma <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IBindingListView"> </xref> e suporta a ordenação de várias colunas; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the data source supports change notification.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se a origem de dados suporta a notificação de alteração.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>em todos os casos.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the data source supports filtering.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se a origem de dados suporta filtragem.

trans-unit.source: If the list is not an <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingListView>, SupportsFiltering always returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: Se a lista não é um <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingListView>, SupportsFiltering sempre devolve `false`.</xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingListView>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the list is an <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IBindingListView"></xref> and supports filtering; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a lista é uma <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IBindingListView"> </xref> e suporta filtragem; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the data source supports searching with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Find*> method.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se a origem de dados suporta a pesquisa com o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Find*>método.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Find*>

trans-unit.source: If the data source is not an <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList>, SupportsSearching always returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: Se a origem de dados não é um <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList>, SupportsSearching sempre devolve `false`.</xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the list is a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IBindingList"></xref> and supports the searching with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Find*> method; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a lista é uma <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IBindingList"> </xref> e suporta a pesquisa com o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Find*>método; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Find*>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the data source supports sorting.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se a origem de dados suporta a ordenação.

trans-unit.source: If the data source is not an <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList>, the SupportsSorting property always returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: Se a origem de dados não é um <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList>, a propriedade SupportsSorting sempre devolve `false`.</xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the data source is an <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IBindingList"></xref> and supports sorting; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a origem de dados é um <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IBindingList"> </xref> e suporta a ordenação; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Suspends data binding to prevent changes from updating the bound data source.
trans-unit.target: Suspende o enlace de dados para impedir que as alterações ao atualizar a origem de dados vinculados.

trans-unit.source: SuspendBinding and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ResumeBinding%2A> are two methods that allow the temporary suspension and resumption of data binding in a simple-binding scenario.
trans-unit.target: SuspendBinding e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ResumeBinding%2A>dois métodos que permitem que a suspensão temporário e recomeço de enlace de dados num cenário de enlace simples.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ResumeBinding%2A>

trans-unit.source: You would typically suspend data binding if the user must be allowed to make several edits to data fields before validation occurs.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, seria suspender o enlace de dados se o utilizador tem permissão para efetuar várias edições aos campos de dados antes de ocorre a validação.

trans-unit.source: For example, if one field must be changed in accordance with a second, but where validating the first field would cause the second field to be in error.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se um campo tem de ser alterado de acordo com um segundo, mas em que a validar o primeiro campo fará com que o campo de segundo estar num erro.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Using SuspendBinding and prevents changes from being pushed into the data source until <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ResumeBinding%2A> is called, but does not actually prevent any events from occurring.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Utilizando SuspendBinding e impede que as alterações que está a ser enviado para a origem de dados até <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ResumeBinding%2A>é chamado, mas não, na verdade, impedir que os eventos ocorram.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ResumeBinding%2A>

trans-unit.source: Controls that use complex data binding, such as the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control, update their values based on change events such as the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager.ListChanged> event, so calling SuspendBinding will not prevent them from receiving changes to the data source.
trans-unit.target: Controlos que utilizam o enlace de dados complexas, tais como o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>controlar, atualize os respetivos valores com base em eventos de alteração, tais como o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager.ListChanged>eventos, para chamar SuspendBinding serão não impedi-los de alterações para a origem de dados a receber.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager.ListChanged> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: For this reason, this SuspendBinding and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ResumeBinding%2A> are designed for use with simple-bound controls, such as the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control.
trans-unit.target: Por este motivo, este SuspendBinding e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ResumeBinding%2A>foram concebidos para utilização com controlos vinculados a simples, tais como o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ResumeBinding%2A>

trans-unit.source: Alternatively you can use these methods in a complex binding scenario if you suppress <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ListChanged> events by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.RaiseListChangedEvents%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Em alternativa, pode utilizar estes métodos num cenário de enlace complexas se pode suprimir <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ListChanged>eventos definindo a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.RaiseListChangedEvents%2A>propriedade `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.RaiseListChangedEvents%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ListChanged>

trans-unit.source: Gets an object that can be used to synchronize access to the underlying list.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um objeto que pode ser utilizado para sincronizar o acesso à lista subjacente.

trans-unit.source: An object that can be used to synchronize access to the underlying list.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto que pode ser utilizado para sincronizar o acesso à lista subjacente.

trans-unit.source: Adds the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref> to the indexes used for searching.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona o <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"> </xref> para índices utilizados para procurar.

trans-unit.source: If the underlying list is an <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList> type, this method will add the <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor> to the indexes; otherwise, calling this method will throw a <xref:System.NotSupportedException>.
trans-unit.target: Se a lista subjacente é um <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList>tipo, adicionará este método <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor>para índices; caso contrário, chamar este método irá gerar um <xref:System.NotSupportedException>.</xref:System.NotSupportedException> </xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor> </xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref> to add to the indexes used for searching.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"> </xref> para adicionar os índices utilizados para procurar.

trans-unit.source: The underlying list is not an <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IBindingList"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A lista subjacente não é um <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IBindingList"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Removes the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref> from the indexes used for searching.
trans-unit.target: Remove o <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"> </xref> de índices utilizados para procurar.

trans-unit.source: If the underlying list is not a <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList?displayProperty=fullName>, this method will always throw a <xref:System.NotSupportedException>.
trans-unit.target: Se a lista subjacente não é um <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList?displayProperty=fullName>Este método sempre irá gerar um <xref:System.NotSupportedException>.</xref:System.NotSupportedException> </xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref> to remove from the indexes used for searching.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"> </xref> para remover os índices utilizados para procurar.

trans-unit.source: Discards a pending new item from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Elimina um pendente novo item da coleção.

trans-unit.source: The ICancelAddNew.CancelNew method rolls back a pending addition of an item previously added to the collection at the index specified by `position`.
trans-unit.target: O método ICancelAddNew.CancelNew reverte uma adição pendente de um item previamente adicionado à coleção no índice especificado pelo `position`.

trans-unit.source: The `position` parameter is necessary because several new items can be simultaneously pending.
trans-unit.target: O `position` parâmetro é necessário porque vários novos itens podem ser pendentes em simultâneo.

trans-unit.source: The index of the item that was added to the collection.
trans-unit.target: O índice do item que foi adicionado à coleção.

trans-unit.source: Commits a pending new item to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Consolida um novo item pendente na coleção.

trans-unit.source: The ICancelAddNew.EndNew method commits a pending addition of an item previously added to the collection at the index specified by `position`.
trans-unit.target: O método ICancelAddNew.EndNew consolida uma adição pendente de um item previamente adicionado à coleção no índice especificado pelo `position`.

trans-unit.source: The `position` parameter is necessary because several new items can be simultaneously pending.
trans-unit.target: O `position` parâmetro é necessário porque vários novos itens podem ser pendentes em simultâneo.

trans-unit.source: The index of the item that was added to the collection.
trans-unit.target: O índice do item que foi adicionado à coleção.

trans-unit.source: Signals the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource"></xref> that initialization is starting.
trans-unit.target: Sinais de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource"> </xref> esse inicialização está a iniciar.

trans-unit.source: Signals the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource"></xref> that initialization is complete.
trans-unit.target: Sinais de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource"> </xref> esse inicialização está concluída.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource"></xref> is initialized.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource"> </xref> está inicializado.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Este membro é uma implementação de membro de interface explícita.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> instance is cast to an <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitializeNotification> interface.
trans-unit.target: Pode ser utilizado apenas quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>instância é convertida para um <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitializeNotification>interface.</xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitializeNotification> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource"></xref> is initialized; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>para indicar o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource"> </xref> é inicializada; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
